item.title:
R to @geoffreylitt: Thanks to everyone who spoke! (you can see the list in the schedule above)
A workshop is only as strong as the work / presenters, and every one was great. Our only problem was having too many good submissions so we had to make the talks short üòÖ
item.dc:creator: @geoffreylitt

item.title:
Have you ever felt like spending six hours watching 17 amazing talks about live programming?
If so... check out the video from LIVE 2024 last week! Everything from intuitive visual representations of program behavior to text editor integrations.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4GOeYylCMJI
item.dc:creator: @geoffreylitt
item.description:

item.title: RT by @geoffreylitt: I guess also that text-based UIs enforce lo-fi UI design, they lower the standards so it feels like anyone can make an interface that fits in
